title: Day the Earth Stood Still 1951 colorized (Michael Rennie)

sources.title: Day The Earth Stood Still
sources.description: When a flying saucer lands on the mall in Washington, DC, the lone occupant (Michael Rennie) is shot by a jumpy soldier. The wounded alien escapes and moves in as a boarder with an Earth family (Patricia Neal, Hugh Marlowe, Billy Gray) in order to learn more about our planet. colorized by Color Systems Technology
